summary: I need help finding a fic. Y/N finds out she's pregnant and, when she tells Harry, he's so excited, but when they hug she smells...
body:
I need help finding a fic. Y/N finds out she’s pregnant and, when she tells Harry, he’s so excited, but when they hug she smells perfume on him and maybe his kiss tastes off. Right afterwards, she finds lipstick on one of his shirts. Harry is oblivious and keeps trying to be close to her, but she’s trying to avoid the confrontation. I think she makes him take his shirt off and there’s either a love bite or scratches. He finally admits that he cheated.

I can’t remember who wrote it! Please help me find it!!

title: Bartender's Luck
body:
Ft. Harry Styles ~ There’s something about him, that draws me to him…but I don’t go after womanizers… Ever.

You Got Me Alone

The moon iluminated the person’s appearance. I almost shrieked at who it really was.“Oh my god! Harry for fuck’s sake! Don’t do that! You scared me to death!” I said, pressing my hand to my chest to…

Read more…

blog.name: awomanindeniall
blog.title: A Woman In Deniall
blog.description:
This bloke with blue eyes, a dodgy knee and a guitar was lounging about all over my main blog, so I had to make this one. 
Kristen, elderly, UK. (Main blog: @busstop)

body:
Plagiarism… again

I’m newish to the 1D fandom - been here about a year. But I’ve been in the tiny but loyal ‘My Mad Fat Diary’ fandom for over 5yrs - since the show aired - and I’ve probably read 99% of the MMFD fic out there!

That’s why it was infuriating to find out, in July, that a 1D writer - @latelatenarry (who I was a big fan of!) - had stolen one-shot fics from a highly-regarded MMFD author, replaced the names and published them to the 1D fandom as her own work. (Please note that I am @busstop in the linked post - my full Niall obsession had yet to kick in!)

At the time, I thought that @latelatenarry had written *most* of her works - especially the chaptered fics - and just stolen a few shorter fics, so she had more to publish and get love for, but it turns out I was being naive, giving her the benefit of the doubt! Most of them are stolen.

The following fics were published by @latelatenarry using her own titles, but are almost exact copies of Twilight fics, from as early as 2012:

I Owe You One is a copy of: https://m.fanfiction.net/s/9011528/1/How-Bella-Got-Her-Groove-Back

Axiom is a copy of: https://m.fanfiction.net/s/7829578/1/Head-over-Feet

These Violent Delights is a copy of: https://m.fanfiction.net/s/7949385/1/Hold-Me-Down

The Greatest Gift is a copy of: https://m.fanfiction.net/s/10873196/1/Walking-Under-Stars

The Guitar is a copy of: https://m.fanfiction.net/s/7948246/1/The-Guitar

and

A Series of Firsts - First Kiss has a big chunk lifted from a Downton Abbey fic: https://m.fanfiction.net/s/10078078/1/Trust-and-Providence

I haven’t challenged @latelatenarry about her plagiarism directly this time, because I can’t - she blocked me as a precaution when she started her new blog in the summer, so that she could post stolen MMFD fics without me seeing (I mention MMFD in my busstop bio and often reblog MMFD gifs) - but she didn’t reckon on there being other MMFD fans following her, who also recognised that these were originally MMFD fics. They messaged her to protest, and were ignored and blocked (but the stolen MMFD fics were quietly removed).

I have contacted the relevant Twilight and DA authors to let them know that their work has been reposted on Tumblr.

Thank you for reading. Plagiarism really pisses me off, because there are so many talented writers across all fandoms who are working their socks off to give us amazing fic to read, free of charge!

Please don’t vote for these fics in any 1D fic awards - @latelatenarry did not write them. Give your vote to an author who deserves it!

The least we can do for our writers is not waste our admiration and praise on someone who is happy to deceive us - even after being caught out once before.

Dear Writers of 1D, MMFD and yes, Twilight fics… we love you! 💕 THANK YOU for all your genuine hard work, & for being so generous with your time & talents!!! 💕

blog.title: Harry Styles Lover
blog.description:
Kelsey :) 23 Harry Styles has my heart.."We never learn, we've been here before." My Masterpieces!
Ask Me Anything!!

title: Don’t Let Me Go-Part 5
body:
*******This is a bit on the shorter side, but i still hope you enjoy!********


*One week later..


Harry’s pov

It had been a week since that dreaded night in the forest. Y/n had gone silent. He had no idea where she was or who she was with. It was breaking his heart. He had spent countless hours thinking about what she had said.

Part of him knew that he had been harboring the same feelings for her as well. He never thought that he deserved a girl like her so he never made a move. But now, he felt like he had lost his chance all together.

Truth be told, he had not come to terms with his feelings for his life time best-friend until he had heard that she was seeing Niall. When that news came, something inside him shifted. He felt jealous and overly protective. He also felt a little taken aback that his two friends would start seeing each other.

With y/n not answering his calls or texts, he knew that he had to go find her. He wanted to talk to her, to tell her the truth. It was all he could think about. Breaking things off with Addison, he booked a flight to London.

Upon arriving at Gemma’s, he had expected y/n to be there. To his dismay, she was not. He spent countless hours trying to persuade his beloved sister to tell him where she was. She was relentless in her will to keep the location a secret. Giving up, he finally just left and went looking anywhere and everywhere.

Glancing at instagram pictures, he figured out what club they were in. Making his way there, he was quickly granted access. Looking around, he spotted the couple.

Y/n looked absolutely stunning, in a tight dress. It fit her curves perfectly, and Harry admired her from afar. He watched as her head fell back in laughter and couldn’t help but smile. She was beautiful.

It was like he was seeing her for the very first time. Suddenly everything in the world made sense. It was like a light had clicked on in his mind. All the time they had spent together had suddenly come back to him. The countless memories and numerous laughs they shared, all seemed to come flooding back.

He knew in that moment that he loved her. He loved her as much more than just a friend. He knew that he would do anything for her.

The night had not gone anything like he had planned. He had wanted to get her alone and confess his feelings to her, in the hopes that she had felt them to. Then  when his sister told him that the beautiful y/n had been in love with him all along, he felt relieved. He felt alive again.

The night in the woods had been one of the hardest moments of his entire life. It broke him to hear how much pain he had put her through all these years. He felt crushed for having caused her so much torment. If he had not been so at a loss for words that night, maybe she wouldn’t have left. Maybe, just maybe, she would be here laying in his arms.

He sat by the window sill and watched the rain fall down. The sky was dark and his heart was broken. He knew that he had to find a way to bring her back to him. He just didn’t know how. If only he knew that she was miles away staring at the same raining sky wishing the same thing.

@titanicbuff1912

With y/n not answering his calls or texts, he knew that he had to go find her. He wanted to talk to her, to tell her the truth. It was all he could think about. Breaking things off with Addison, he booked a flight to London.

Upon arriving at Gemma’s, he had expected y/n to be there. To his dismay, she was not. He spent countless hours trying to persuade his beloved sister to tell him where she was. She was relentless in her will to keep the location a secret. Giving up, he finally just left and went looking anywhere and everywhere.

Glancing at instagram pictures, he figured out what club they were in. Making his way there, he was quickly granted access. Looking around, he spotted the couple.

Y/n looked absolutely stunning, in a tight dress. It fit her curves perfectly, and Harry admired her from afar. He watched as her head fell back in laughter and couldn’t help but smile. She was beautiful.

It was like he was seeing her for the very first time. Suddenly everything in the world made sense. It was like a light had clicked on in his mind. All the time they had spent together had suddenly come back to him. The countless memories and numerous laughs they shared, all seemed to come flooding back.

He knew in that moment that he loved her. He loved her as much more than just a friend. He knew that he would do anything for her.

The night had not gone anything like he had planned. He had wanted to get her alone and confess his feelings to her, in the hopes that she had felt them to. Then  when his sister told him that the beautiful y/n had been in love with him all along, he felt relieved. He felt alive again.

The night in the woods had been one of the hardest moments of his entire life. It broke him to hear how much pain he had put her through all these years. He felt crushed for having caused her so much torment. If he had not been so at a loss for words that night, maybe she wouldn’t have left. Maybe, just maybe, she would be here laying in his arms.

He sat by the window sill and watched the rain fall down. The sky was dark and his heart was broken. He knew that he had to find a way to bring her back to him. He just didn’t know how. If only he knew that she was miles away staring at the same raining sky wishing the same thing.

@titanicbuff1912
trail.content:
*******This is a bit on the shorter side, but i still hope you enjoy!********


*One week later..


Harry’s pov

It had been a week since that dreaded night in the forest. Y/n had gone silent. He had no idea where she was or who she was with. It was breaking his heart. He had spent countless hours thinking about what she had said.

Part of him knew that he had been harboring the same feelings for her as well. He never thought that he deserved a girl like her so he never made a move. But now, he felt like he had lost his chance all together.

Truth be told, he had not come to terms with his feelings for his life time best-friend until he had heard that she was seeing Niall. When that news came, something inside him shifted. He felt jealous and overly protective. He also felt a little taken aback that his two friends would start seeing each other.

With y/n not answering his calls or texts, he knew that he had to go find her. He wanted to talk to her, to tell her the truth. It was all he could think about. Breaking things off with Addison, he booked a flight to London.

Upon arriving at Gemma’s, he had expected y/n to be there. To his dismay, she was not. He spent countless hours trying to persuade his beloved sister to tell him where she was. She was relentless in her will to keep the location a secret. Giving up, he finally just left and went looking anywhere and everywhere.

Glancing at instagram pictures, he figured out what club they were in. Making his way there, he was quickly granted access. Looking around, he spotted the couple.

Y/n looked absolutely stunning, in a tight dress. It fit her curves perfectly, and Harry admired her from afar. He watched as her head fell back in laughter and couldn’t help but smile. She was beautiful.

It was like he was seeing her for the very first time. Suddenly everything in the world made sense. It was like a light had clicked on in his mind. All the time they had spent together had suddenly come back to him. The countless memories and numerous laughs they shared, all seemed to come flooding back.

He knew in that moment that he loved her. He loved her as much more than just a friend. He knew that he would do anything for her.

The night had not gone anything like he had planned. He had wanted to get her alone and confess his feelings to her, in the hopes that she had felt them to. Then  when his sister told him that the beautiful y/n had been in love with him all along, he felt relieved. He felt alive again.

The night in the woods had been one of the hardest moments of his entire life. It broke him to hear how much pain he had put her through all these years. He felt crushed for having caused her so much torment. If he had not been so at a loss for words that night, maybe she wouldn’t have left. Maybe, just maybe, she would be here laying in his arms.

He sat by the window sill and watched the rain fall down. The sky was dark and his heart was broken. He knew that he had to find a way to bring her back to him. He just didn’t know how. If only he knew that she was miles away staring at the same raining sky wishing the same thing.

@titanicbuff1912
